item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "This is your life and its ending one moment at a time." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Today is the sort of day where the sun only comes up to humiliate you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Have your adventures, make your mistakes, and choose your friends poorly -- all these make for great stories." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I am Jack's complete lack of surprise. I am Jack's Broken Heart." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Hysteria is impossible without an audience. Panicking by yourself is the same as laughing alone in an empty room. You feel really silly." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Big Brother isn’t watching. He’s singing and dancing. He’s pulling rabbits out of a hat. Big Brother’s busy holding your attention every moment you’re awake. He’s making sure you’re always distracted. He’s making sure you’re fully absorbed." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If you're going to read this, don't bother." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Just keep asking yourself: What would Jesus not do?" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If you don't know what you want," the doorman said, "you end up with a lot you don't." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We've taken the world apart but we have no idea what to do with the pieces." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "People fall so in love with their pain, they can’t leave it behind. The same as the stories they tell. We trap ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We can spend our lives letting the world tell us who we are. Sane or insane. Saints or sex addicts. Heroes or victims. Letting history tell us how good or bad we are. Letting our past decide our future. Or we can decide for ourselves. And maybe it's our job to invent something better." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Could you hold the chainsaw a bit closer to your mouth, please?" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "That’s the American Dream: to make your life into something you can sell." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "There is a theory which states that if ever anyone discovers exactly what the Universe is for and why it is here, it will instantly disappear and be replaced by something even more bizarre and inexplicable. There is another theory which states that this has already happened." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The fact that we live at the bottom of a deep gravity well, on the surface of a gas covered planet going around a nuclear fireball 90 million miles away and think this to be normal is obviously some indication of how skewed our perspective tends to be." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "And then I felt sad because I realized that once people are broken in certain ways, they can't ever be fixed, and this is something nobody ever tells you when you are young and it never fails to surprise you as you grow older as you see the people in your life break one by one. You wonder when your turn is going to be, or if it's already happened." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Starved for affection, terrified of abandonment, I began to wonder if sex was really just an excuse to look deeply into another human being's eyes." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "As the expression goes, we spend our youth attaining wealth, and our wealth attaining youth." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "All systems have failed me. In five minutes I'll be fine again for a while, but right now the inside of my head feels like Niagara Falls without the noise, just this mist and churning and no real sense of where earth ends and heaven begins." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Nelly add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch
